name: 周峻忠
objective:
The objectives of our physical education program are to train the body and mind, promote sound physical and mental development, cultivate sports ethics, promote teamwork, and develop lifelong sports habits.
(1)Students will learn the concept of health management and lifelong exercise so that they can learn to participate and learn in a more diversified way.
(2) Practical courses to enhance health fitness, to achieve health promotion and disease prevention through their own participation experience, and to understand the concept and methods of health fitness.
(3) Through physical fitness and health and exercise related videos, students can understand the impact of exercise on physiology (body) and develop a habit of exercise.
(4) To use the equipment in the physical fitness classroom to improve cardiorespiratory and muscular fitness, and to design their own cardiorespiratory, muscular and physical fitness programs.
schedule:
Week 1 Introduction to the course and introduction 
Week 2 Health Fitness and Athletic Fitness 
Week 3 Assessment, operation and application of cardiorespiratory fitness (1) 
Week 4 Assessment, operation and application of cardiopulmonary fitness (2) 
Week 5 Evaluation, operation and application of muscle strength and muscle endurance (1)
Week 6 Evaluation, operation and application of muscle strength and muscle endurance (2) 
Week 7 Evaluation, operation and application of muscle strength and muscle endurance (3)
Week 8 Evaluation, manipulation and application of muscle strength and endurance (4) 
Week 9 Midterm examination 
Week 10 Flexibility assessment, operation and application
Week 11 Exercise and weight management 
Week 12 Special training method (1): Interval training, Fartlek training
Week 13 Special training method (2): Intensification training, vibration training, stress training
Week 14 Special training method (3): Circuit training, crossfit
Week 15 Exercise prescription design
Week 16 Physical fitness assessment 1
Week 17 Physical fitness assessment 2
Week 18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
(1) Regular Grade & Attendance Grade: 30%

(2) Midterm Grade: 20%
Accumulated physical activity after school hours

(3) Final Academic Test: 40% 
Cardiorespiratory endurance and muscle strength test
